channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 20:55 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 20:55 Alarm lifted in Sumy region. Follow further messages. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 20:54 The alarm has been lifted in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still ongoing in: - the city of Marhanets and the Marhanets territorial community
